Class TemporaryIntegratingFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.pipeline.filters.AbstractFilter
      • de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.pipeline.filters.TemporaryIntegratingFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkDataSink, NetworkDataSource

    public class TemporaryIntegratingFilter
extends AbstractFilter
    This filter sums up the previous n values

    • Constructor Detail

      • TemporaryIntegratingFilter

        public TemporaryIntegratingFilter(@Nullable
                                  NetworkDataSink sink,
                                  int length)
        Create a new TemporaryIntegratingFilter
        Parameters:
        sink - either a valid network data sink, or null. if null, AbstractFilter.setDataSink(NetworkDataSink) must be called prior to starting operations.
        length - the length after which sensor data will be ignored

    • Method Detail

      • onData

        public void onData(NetworkDevice origin,
                   SensorData data,
                   float userSensitivity)
        Add current values to the storage
        Parameters:
        origin - the network device which sent the data
        data - the current sensor data
        userSensitivity - the sensitivity the user requested in his app settings for the sensor the data is from

      • sum

        private void sum(float[] target)
        Sum all values (for each element of the triple) and store that in the parameter array
        Parameters:
        target - the destination for the values

      • resetFilter

        public void resetFilter()
        This method sets all axis sums back to 0 in order to set a new initial position for the smart phone
